Sentece: The total chromatography time for a single sample is approximately 10 min.
Title: Liquid chromatographic assay and pharmacokinetics of halazepam and its metabolite in humans.

Sentece: A sensitivity of 1 ng/mL for halazepam and nordiazepam is attained when 1 mL of plasma is extracted.
Title: Liquid chromatographic assay and pharmacokinetics of halazepam and its metabolite in humans.

Sentece: Analytical recovery of halazepam and nordiazepam added to the plasma ranged from 89 to 96%.
Title: Liquid chromatographic assay and pharmacokinetics of halazepam and its metabolite in humans.

Sentece: Mean oral plasma clearance of halazepam was 24 L/h.
Title: Liquid chromatographic assay and pharmacokinetics of halazepam and its metabolite in humans.

Sentece: The mean apparent elimination half-life of nordiazepam (45.22 h) is considerably longer than that of halazepam (21.15 h).
